eligibilityTitle: Check if you can apply online
title: Are you the spouse, civil partner or child of the person who died
question: Are you the spouse, civil partner or child of the person who died?
hintText1: This does not include long-term partners who lived together but did not marry or enter into a civil partnership.
hintText2: You may need to provide your certificate of marriage or civil partnership.

related.required: Select ‘yes’ if you’re the spouse, civil partner or child of the person who died
